import React from 'react'; import { DocumentTextIcon, CheckCircleIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, ClockIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const InsuranceValuations: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Insurance Valuations

Ensure adequate coverage with accurate insurance valuations. We help you determine the right level of business insurance by providing detailed valuations of assets, revenue streams, and business interruption impacts.

{/* Key Features */}

Our Insurance Services

  • Business interruption calculations

    Assess potential loss of income and profits

  • Asset replacement valuations

    Current replacement cost assessments

  • Key person insurance assessments

    Value impact of key personnel loss

  • Risk mitigation analysis

    Identify and quantify business risks

{/* Process */}

Coverage Assessment

Evaluate current insurance levels against actual business value.

Risk Analysis

Identify potential risks and their financial impact on operations.

Regular Updates

Periodic revaluations to maintain appropriate coverage levels.

{/* Call to Action */}

Review Your Insurance Coverage?

Don't be under-insured. Contact us to ensure your business has adequate insurance coverage based on accurate valuations.

ðŸ“ž Call: 1300 520 121
); }; export default InsuranceValuations;
